Headline: O'Hare- bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare- bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick rider at Montrose. Service is resuming, allow extra time

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare- bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick rider at Montrose.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #52 Kedzie/California and # 52A South Kedzie Temporary Reroute at Kedzie/54th
ShortDescription: #52 Kedzie/California and # 52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 51st, California, 55th & Kedzie, due to police activity near Kedzie/54th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
52 Kedzie/California and # 52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kedzie, 51st, California, 55th, then resume their normal route on Kedzie, due to police activity near Kedzie/54th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute near Madison/Damen
ShortDescription: 20 Madison buses temp. rerouted EB Madison, Damen, Jackson, Ogden, Pualina and Madison; WB Madison, Ashland, Washington, Damen and Madison near Madison/Damen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Madison/Damen due to a Festival near Madison/Damen.

Eastbound buses will operate via Madison, Damen, Jackson, Ogden, Paulina and Madison including the normal route streets.

Westbound buses will operate via Madison, Ashland, Washington, Damen and Madison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #19 United Center Express Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Madison/Damen
ShortDescription: Eastbound 19 United Center Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Damen, Jackson, Ogden and Washington: due to, a  Festival near Madison/Damen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #19 United Center Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Damen, Jackson, Ogden and Washington: due to, a  Festival near Madison/Damen.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near 47th/Cornelia
ShortDescription: Northbound 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Cottage Grove, 39th and Lake Shore Drive, due to street blockage near 47th/Cornelia.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Cottage Grove, 39th and Lake Shore Drive, due to street blockage near 47th/Cornelia.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
